message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.SY, cs.NE 

The paper discusses a machine learning approach that unifies bandit and gradient-based learning for global optimization. This topic is relevant to several sub-categories of computer science, including machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), data structures and algorithms (cs.DS), control systems (cs.SY), and neural and evolutionary computing (cs.NE). However, given the focus on optimization and learning, cs.LG and cs.AI are the most likely sub-categories.
